name: Progress towards delivering the EPBD?
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: EU Directives are driving the agenda for Europe. The first challenge is to reach ‘nearly zero’ buildings by 2020. What are the legislative, physical and design methods that will affect delivery? What are the opportunities for design and technology?

presentations.name: European legislation and its potential impact for the UK
presentations.speakers: Martin Russell-Croucher, Director of Sustainability and Special Projects, RICS

presentations.name: What will the future look like? What should it look like?
The Design Challenge – managing expectations in delivering long term sustainability
Overcoming the problem of over-heating
presentations.speakers: Rob Pannell, Director, Zero Carbon Hub

presentations.name: Upgrade from Fabric First to Zero Bills – ZEDroof and the ‘Zero Bills Home’
presentations.speakers:
Bill Dunster, OBE, Principal, ZEDFactory
Rehan Khodabuccus, Technical Manager, ZEDfactory
